String.Dest: Sono stati rilevati degli errori nelle impostazioni di Skyrim.ini
La versione di SKSE è troppo vecchia.
Il file SKSE non è stato trovato

String.Source: Quest that holds the alias that attaches itself to the Player Character.
String.Dest: Quest that holds the alias that attaches itself to the Player Character.

String.Source: Quest that holds the aliases that attach themselves to unread books.
String.Dest: Quest that holds the aliases that attach themselves to unread books.

String.Source: Quest that holds an alias that attaches itself to the Player Character to manage adding books to the inventory filter form list.
String.Dest: Quest that holds an alias that attaches itself to the Player Character to manage adding books to the inventory filter form list.

String.Source: Quest that holds the various functions called by my other scripts.
String.Dest: Quest that holds the various functions called by my other scripts.

String.Source: Book that forces the player's inventory screen to update itself.
String.Dest: Book that forces the player's inventory screen to update itself.

String.Source: Magic effect used to track player moving to a new cell.
String.Dest: Magic effect used to track player moving to a new cell.

String.Source:
It appears that one or more of the following settings in Skyrim.ini has been changed from their defaults: [Papyrus] fUpdateBudgetMS=1.2 fExtraTaskletBudgetMS=1.2 iMinMemoryPageSize=128 iMaxMemoryPageSize=512 iMaxAllocatedMemoryBytes=76800
Changing these settings can reduce your game's performance and stability. I do not support installing my mod in a game with these setting changed. Please exit the game, open your Skyrim.ini file and change the above settings back to their defaults.
String.Dest:
Sembra che una o più delle seguenti impostazioni di default siano state cambiate: [Papyrus] fUpdateBudgetMS=1.2 fExtraTaskletBudgetMS=1.2 iMinMemoryPageSize=128 iMaxMemoryPageSize=512 iMaxAllocatedMemoryBytes=76800
Cambiare queste impostazioni può ridurre la performance e la stabilità del gioco. L’installazione della mod con questi cambiamenti non è consigliata. Si prega di uscire dal gioco, aprile il file Skyrim.ini e ripristinare le impostazioni originali.

String.Source: What do you want to do with this book?
What do you want to do with this book?

Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) was detected but it is too old to properly run my mod.
Please exit the game and upgrade your copy of SKSE to at least version 2.0.12 (though I recommend the latest version).
String.Dest:
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) è stato rilevato ma la versione è troppo vecchia per funzionare correttamente nella mod.
Si prega di uscire dal gioco e aggiornare la copia di SKSE almeno alla versione 2.0.12 (anche se si consiglia l’ultima versione).

String.Source:
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) was not detected. My mod requires SKSE to function properly.
Please exit the game and either install SKSE version 2.0.12 (or later) or check that it is installed properly.
String.Dest:
Il file Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) non è stato rilevato. La mod richiede l’installazione di SKSE per funzionare correttamente.
Si prega di uscire dal gioco, installare la versione SKSE 2.0.12 (o seguente) o di controllare che sia installata correttamente.

String.Source: This magic ability is used to track the player moving to a new cell.
String.Dest: This magic ability is used to track the player moving to a new cell.
